about_the_game:
A collection of songs from Touhou Fairy Knockout, featuring the original lossless versions of the OST. If you love Fairy Knockout's music, then this is one OST you don't want to miss out on!

The OST currently contains all 20 publicly released songs, however a total of 27 songs have already been made, and the amount of songs may possibly exceed 30.

To avoid spoilers, the OST will be updated in sync with the game. We'll be continuously adding in tracks until the collection is complete!

So once you've bought this OST, you can expect more and more songs over time. Be sure to keep an eye on it!

Moreover, the songs being looped in-game means they can't be enjoyed in its entirety.

The OST versions have a defined beginning and end, giving you the full experience.

All songs boast superb quality and is undeniably worth your investment.

A collection of songs from Touhou Fairy Knockout, featuring the original lossless versions of the OST. If you love Fairy Knockout's music, then this is one OST you don't want to miss out on!

The OST currently contains all 20 publicly released songs, however a total of 27 songs have already been made, and the amount of songs may possibly exceed 30.

To avoid spoilers, the OST will be updated in sync with the game. We'll be continuously adding in tracks until the collection is complete!

So once you've bought this OST, you can expect more and more songs over time. Be sure to keep an eye on it!

Moreover, the songs being looped in-game means they can't be enjoyed in its entirety.

The OST versions have a defined beginning and end, giving you the full experience.

All songs boast superb quality and is undeniably worth your investment.
